subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Two days after several Ohio State freshmen wore wristbands supporting the former Buckeyes coach Jim Tressel, the university has taken them away and refunded the players’ money.
snippet: Two days after several Ohio State freshmen wore wristbands supporting the former Buckeyes coach Jim Tressel, the university has taken them away and refunded the players’ money.
